Articles.Content:
Sticky keys claims another victim.....

My aircraft had just completed the 15 minute journey across the sea from the KSS and as I was adjusting the throttle for landing sticky keys kicks in and kills me.

fab.
Which version of Windows are you using? It is possible to make sticky keys go away for ever!
I want to know how! Can you do it with windows 7?
Simply trigger them by repeatedly pressing shift, then when the dialog box appears, check its options; you can disable them from there.
thanks, unfortunately it is too late for the pilots.
